name: wid1_F2F1_module4
label: F2F 1: zygosity questionnaire for cohorts 3 & 4 (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: zygosity.

items.name: sex
items.text: Interviewer: Please record:
items.text_de: Interviewer: Bitte eintragen:

items.name: zyg1000
items.text: Who was born first?
items.text_de: Wer wurde als erstes geboren?

zyg0200.question: zyg0200
zyg0200.name: zyg0200
zyg0200.label: How tall are you currently in cm?

items.name: zyg0200
items.text: How tall are you currently in cm?
items.text_de: Wie gross sind Sie gegenwaertig in cm?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg0201.question: zyg0201
zyg0201.name: zyg0201
zyg0201.label: How tall is your twin brother/twin sister currently?

items.name: zyg0201
items.text: How tall is your twin brother/twin sister currently?
items.text_de: Wie gross ist Ihr Zwillingsbruder/Ihre Zwillingsschwester gegenwaertig?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1100.question: zyg1100
zyg1100.name: zyg1100
zyg1100.label: Is your hair texture different from your twin brother's/sister's hair texture (e.g., fine or thick, straight or curly)?

items.name: zyg1100
items.text: Is your hair texture different from your twin brother's/sister's hair texture (e.g., fine or thick, straight or curly)?
items.text_de: Besteht ein Unterschied in der Haargestalt (z. B. feines, starkes, glattes, krauses Haar) zwischen Ihnen und Ihrem Zwillingsbruder/Ihrer Zwillingsschwester?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

answers.label: 2: yes, there is a slight difference.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, es gibt einen leichten Unterschied.

answers.label: 3: yes, there is a clear difference.
answers.label_de: 3: Ja, es gibt einen deutlichen Unterschied.

zyg1101.question: zyg1101
zyg1101.name: zyg1101
zyg1101.label: Do you have additional hair, e.g., on your legs, upper body, hands, or face?

items.name: zyg1101
items.text: Do you have additional hair, e.g., on your legs, upper body, hands, or face?
items.text_de: Haben Sie zusaetzliche Behaarung z.B. der Beine, des Oberkoerpers, der Haende, des Gesichts?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1102.question: zyg1102
zyg1102.name: zyg1102
zyg1102.label: Does your twin brother/your twin sister have additional hair, e.g., on his/her legs, upper body, hands, or face?

items.name: zyg1102
items.text: Does your twin brother/your twin sister have additional hair, e.g., on his/her legs, upper body, hands, or face?
items.text_de: Hat Ihr Zwillingsbruder/Ihre Zwillingsschwester zusaetzliche Behaarung z.B. der Beine, des Oberkoerpers, der Haende, des Gesichts?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1204.label: Is the color of your eyes different from the color of your twin brother's/sister's eyes?

items.name: zyg1204
items.text: Is the color of your eyes different from the color of your twin brother's/sister's eyes?
items.text_de: Besteht zwischen Ihnen und Ihrem Zwillingsbruder/Ihrer Zwillingsschwester ein Unterschied in der Augenfarbe?

answers.label: 2: yes, there is a slight difference.

answers.label: 3: yes, there is a clear difference.
answers.label_de: 3: Ja, es besteht ein deutlicher Unterschied.

zyg1300.name: zyg1300

zyg1500.name: zyg1500

items.text: When you were children, did people confuse you with your twin?
items.text_de: Wurden Sie in Ihrer Kindheit von anderen Leuten miteinander verwechselt?

zyg1501.question: zyg1501
zyg1501.name: zyg1501
zyg1501.label: Which of the following people confused you with your twin? Please consider all groups of people and tick the appropriate answer:

items.name: zyg1501
items.text: Which of the following people confused you with your twin? Please consider all groups of people and tick the appropriate answer:
items.text_de: Welche von den nachstehend genannten Personen verwechselte Sie? Bitte ziehen Sie alle Personengruppen in Betracht und kreuzen Sie die jeweils gewaehlte Antwort an:
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1506.question: zyg1506
zyg1506.name: zyg1506
zyg1506.label: Did your parents or childcare providers make any special efforts to be able to tell you apart (e.g., different color hair ribbons for girls, different clothing, etc.)?

items.name: zyg1506
items.text: Did your parents or childcare providers make any special efforts to be able to tell you apart (e.g., different color hair ribbons for girls, different clothing, etc.)?
items.text_de: Haben Ihre Eltern oder Betreuer sich besondere Muehe geben muessen, um Sie voneinander unterscheiden zu koennen (z. B. verschieden gefaerbte Schleifen bei Maedchen, unterschiedliche Kleidung)?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1507.question: zyg1507
zyg1507.name: zyg1507
zyg1507.label: Are people able to clearly tell you apart from your twin when looking at a recent photograph of the two of you together?

items.name: zyg1507
items.text: Are people able to clearly tell you apart from your twin when looking at a recent photograph of the two of you together?
items.text_de: Gelingt es anderen bei der Betrachtung eines neuen gemeinsamen Lichtbildes von Ihnen und Ihrem Zwillingsbruder/Ihrer Zwillingsschwester leicht, Sie einwandfrei voneinander zu unterscheiden?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

answers.label: 3: yo, we often get mistaken for one another in photographs.
answers.label_de: 3: Nein, wir werden auf Lichtbildern oft verwechselt.

zyg0501.question: zyg0501
zyg0501.name: zyg0501
zyg0501.label: Please enter your blood group and the blood group of your twin brother/your twin sister.

items.name: zyg0501
items.text: Please enter your blood group and the blood group of your twin brother/your twin sister.
items.text_de: Tragen Sie bitte Ihre Blutgruppe und die Blutgruppe Ihres Zwillingsbruders/Ihrer Zwillingsschwester ein

zyg1700.name: zyg1700
zyg1700.label: As a child were you ill as often as your twin brother/twin sister?

items.text: As a child were you ill as often as your twin brother/twin sister?
items.text_de: Waren Sie als Kind ebenso oft krank wie Ihr Zwillingsbruder/Ihre Zwillingsschwester?

zyg1800.question: zyg1800
zyg1800.name: zyg1800
zyg1800.label: What do you think: Are you identical twins or non-identical twins (monozygotic or dizygotic)?

items.name: zyg1800
items.text: What do you think: Are you identical twins or non-identical twins (monozygotic or dizygotic)?
items.text_de: Was glauben Sie persoenlich: Sind Sie eineiige oder zweieiige Zwillinge?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

zyg1801.question: zyg1801
zyg1801.name: zyg1801
zyg1801.label: Has a medical professional (e.g., your family doctor, a nurse, a physician) ever told you your zygosity?

items.name: zyg1801
items.text: Has a medical professional (e.g., your family doctor, a nurse, a physician) ever told you your zygosity?
items.text_de: Wurde Ihnen jemals von medizinischem Personal (z.B. Hausarzt, Krankenschwester, Facharzt) Ihre Eiigkeit mitgeteilt?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany
items.description_de: Source: Adapted from: Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany

answers.label: 1: yes, we were told that they are identical.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie eineiig sind.

answers.label: 2: yes, we were told that they are non-identical.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie zweieiig sind.

answers.label: 3: no, we were never given any such information.
answers.label_de: 3: Nein, darueber wurde uns nichts mitgeteilt.

zyg0900.question: zyg0900
zyg0900.name: zyg0900
zyg0900.label: In which generation and on which side of your family (mother's/father's) were there or are there other twins? Multiple answers possible.

items.name: zyg0900
items.text: In which generation and on which side of your family (mother's/father's) were there or are there other twins? Multiple answers possible.
items.text_de: In welcher Generation und in welchem Teil Ihrer Familie (muetterlicherseits/vaeterlicherseits) gab oder gibt es Zwillinge? Sie koennen mehrere Angaben machen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. zyg0920.question: zyg0920
zyg0920.name: zyg0920
zyg0920.label: For each set of twins in your family, please state whether they are identical/monozygotic or non-identical/dizygotic.

items.name: zyg0920
items.text: For each set of twins in your family, please state whether they are identical/monozygotic or non-identical/dizygotic.
